Course Offerings - 2021-2022 Academic Year

Regardless of the course in question, I believe in a student-centred, holistic approach to all aspects of language learning. Being myself a student of two foreign tongues and having experienced the at times daunting challenges involved, I place great importance on one-to-one instruction guided not only by the learning styles and specific needs of my students but also by an adaptive methodology focused on flexibility, collaboration and personalisation. For further information, please do not hesitate to get in touch. I would love to discuss your needs and find a way of making your lessons as rich and beneficial as possible.

(The following fees are for 1 hour of private language instruction. For semi-private lessons and small groups, please contact me here or at info@theenglishnook.ch.)

English for General Purposes (A1-C2)

CHF 45

English for Professional Purposes (Medicine, Finance, Law, Business Management or Marketing)

CHF 55

Cambridge Exam Support (YLE, KET, PET, FCE, CAE and CPE)

CHF 50

TOEFL Exam Support

CHF 50

TOEFL Young Learners Exam Support (Primary & Junior)

CHF 50

IELTS Exam Support

CHF 50

Customisable Lessons

Cannot find what you are looking for?

Do not hesitate to contact me with your ideas!

I would be more than happy to design a course based on your interests.

English Nook /ˈɪŋɡl(ɪ)ʃnʊk/ n [ingle + shh + nook] 1: a quiet, cosy corner dedicated to English lessons and translation 2 gen : a place to learn or study English with the support of a caring teacher
